I think I have just the right game-changers for you! If you're looking for a film that's all about American football, I'd recommend "Patton". It may not be directly about football, but it's an iconic biographical drama that explores the life of General George S. Patton, and features powerful performances from George C. Scott.

If you're open to something a bit more unconventional, I'd suggest "Creepshow 2". While it doesn't have much to do with American football, it does feature some campy humor and spooky fun - just be prepared for a wild ride!

Or if you prefer something more light-hearted, you might enjoy "Jerry Maguire" (1996), which is a sports-themed comedy-drama starring Tom Cruise as a sports agent who has a crisis of conscience.
